data.message: 'Like' buttons aren't working. Why???? What do I have to do to use them again? They're awesome!!😀

replies.message: Hey there. We recommend updating you mobile application to access Reactions. To use Reactions, hover over the Like button on your desktop or press and hold the Like button on your mobile device. If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1nAx4Os. -Anna
Hey I just updated to the latest version and now my reactions aren't working...they're not even an option anymore. 😭😭 What's up with that?

Hey there. We recommend updating you mobile application to access Reactions. To use Reactions, hover over the Like button on your desktop or press and hold the Like button on your mobile device. If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1nAx4Os. -Anna
Tremayne Davis I'm having the same issue
